fullText: Janet McTeer gives a barnstorming performance as the legendary French actress Sarah Bernhardt in Theresa Rebeck's fascinating biographical play about the Divine Sarah's determination to play Hamlet.
dtliExcerpt: Janet McTeer gives a barnstorming performance as the legendary French actress Sarah Bernhardt in Theresa Rebeck's fascinating biographical play about the Divine Sarah's determination to play Hamlet.
